about_the_game:
This is a unofficial derivative fangame of the Touhou Project. It complies with the official guidelines for derivative work.

FEATURES

  • Learn the basics of Cognitive Behavioral Therapy with Yuuka Kazami in this cute visual novel!
  • Learn scientifically proven techniques to help manage your mental health problems!
  • Cute art!
  • Atmospheric Scenery!
  • Easy going, casual visual novel gameplay!
  • Engaging Dialogue!

STORY

After seeing an ad for some Cognitive Behavioral Therapy (CBT) lessons offered by none other then Yuuka Kazami, one of the most powerful Youkai in all of Gensokyo, you make your way towards the sunflower depot to meet her. She seems to mean well... for now.

This game is not meant to treat or diagnose any medical condition and is not meant as a substitute for professional help.
name: CBT With Yuuka Kazami

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or above
  • Processor: Dual Core Intel or AMD CPU
  • Graphics: Integrated HD Graphics

short_description: Cognitive Behavioral Therapy, also known as CBT, is the use of evidence based strategies to help manage symptoms of poor mental health problems such as stress, anxiety and depression. Yuuka Kazami from the Touhou Project invites you to some mostly peaceful lessons where you grasp the basics of CBT!
